analysis.description:
MajorityGame.sendAwardToLastWinner (/unique_chucks/14/0x08f7e145df8b9a10a40674d7ed8396a3a9eae650.sol#347-361) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- address(add).transfer(address(this).balance) (/unique_chucks/14/0x08f7e145df8b9a10a40674d7ed8396a3a9eae650.sol#359-360)

MajorityGameFactory.setJackpot (/unique_chucks/14/0x08f7e145df8b9a10a40674d7ed8396a3a9eae650.sol#54-64) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-mGame.setJackpot.value(val)() (/unique_chucks/14/0x08f7e145df8b9a10a40674d7ed8396a3a9eae650.sol#62-64)

MajorityGame.sendAward has external calls inside a loop:
	- this.sendAwardToLastWinner() (/unique_chucks/14/0x08f7e145df8b9a10a40674d7ed8396a3a9eae650.sol#340)

MajorityGame.sendAward has external calls inside a loop:
	- this.sendAwardToLastWinner() (/unique_chucks/14/0x08f7e145df8b9a10a40674d7ed8396a3a9eae650.sol#345)
Parameter '_gameBet' of MajorityGameFactory.createGame (/unique_chucks/14/0x08f7e145df8b9a10a40674d7ed8396a3a9eae650.sol#28) is not in mixedCase
